ygData.subject: Re: Fletching information
ygData.msgSnippet: There are a couple of merchants just outside of Oggok or in Oggok who have fletching components, as I recall.  I switched servers and characters two weeks ago,
ygData.messageBody:
There are a couple of merchants just outside of Oggok or in Oggok who have fletching components, as I recall. I switched servers and characters two weeks ago, and I cannot remember exactly where. If you take the path leading from oggok and turn left, you will pass several stone houses, in several of these houses are various merchants. I believe some of them have limited fletching stuff. Stay left every time it branches though.


> ** Original Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] Fletching information
> ** Original Sender: "Dasher" <Dasher@...>
> ** Original Date: Wed, 12 May 1999 20:37:10 -0700

> ** Original Message follows...

>
> From: "Dasher" <Dasher@...>
>
> At the moment I only know of two places to buy the components. One is in
> Kelethin, and the other is in Surefall. I don't know of any evil friendly
> areas that have fletcher merchants. Sorry.
>
> Rithannan of Cazic-Thule
>
